channel.title: Pages on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Syniti Documentation

item.title: Construct Launch
item.description: Construct Launch Use this page to access the pages as described below. To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Select Construct in the Context bar. Field Description Wave Name Displays the name of the Wave in the current context to which the construction page belongs. Process Area Displays the name of the Process Area in the current context to which the construction page belongs.

item.title: Construct Object
item.description: Construct Object Use this page to [View the Construction Page in Construct](../Use_Cases/View_the_Construction_page_in_Construct.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Select Construct in the Context bar. Click the Objectsicon on the Construct Launch page. Field Description OBJECT NAME Displays the name of the Object that contains Targets to which Construct pages are added. Objects are added in Console.

item.title: Construct Page
item.description: Construct Page Use this page to [View the Construction Page in Construct](../Use_Cases/View_the_Construction_page_in_Construct.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Select Construct in the Context bar. Click the Objectsicon on the Construct Launch page. Click the Targets icon for an Object. Click the Construct Pages icon for the Target. Field Description OBJECT NAME Displays the name of the Object that contains Targets to which Construct pages are added.

item.title: Construct Target
item.description: Construct Target Use this page to [View the Construction Page in Construct](../Use_Cases/View_the_Construction_page_in_Construct.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Select Construct in the Context bar. Click the Objectsicon on the Construct Launch page. Click the Targets icon for an Object. Field Description OBJECT NAME Displays the name of the Object that contains the Target to which a Construct pages has been added.

item.title: ZSource
item.description: ZSource Use this page to [Set up ZSources.](../Config/Set_up_ZSources.htm) To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Select Construct in the Context bar. Click ZSource in the Navigation pane. Field Description Z SOURCE Displays name of Source where data is being created. Users Click to open the ZSourceUser page to manage users who can create data for the Source.

item.title: ZSourceUser
item.description: ZSourceUser Use this page to [Set up ZSources.](../Config/Set_up_ZSources.htm) To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Select Construct in the Context bar. Click ZSource in the Navigation pane. Click the Users icon for the ZSource. Field Description Z SOURCE Displays name of Source where data is being created. USER NAME Displays name of user permitted to create data for the Source.
